definitions.definition:
quadratic (of a class of polynomial of the form 
  
    
      
        y
        =
        a
        .
        
          x
          
            2
          
        
        +
        b
        .
        x
        +
        c
      
    
    {\displaystyle y=a.x^{2}+b.x+c}
  
)
